snippet: Carlos Slim Helú has retained his top spot on the Forbes annual ranking of the world's richest people, but Bill Gates is gaining ground on the Mexican billionaire.
abstract: Carlos Slim Helú has retained his top spot on the Forbes annual ranking of the world's richest people, but Bill Gates is gaining ground on the Mexican billionaire.

headline.main: Despite Dip in Fortune, Slim Still the World's Richest Man
